physical_appearance: This is a pair of trousers which is part of a bridegroom's clothes. It is features vertical multicoloured stripes. It has wide legs that narrows on the bottom. The bottom portions of the pants feature a dense multicoloured embroidery of repeated geometric patterns.
sgcool_label_text: This set of garments - tunic, trousers and a turban cloth - form a set of bridegroom's clothes among the Dhebaria Rabari community of east Kutch. The group features excellent cotton embroidery incorporating mirrorwork embellishments. The fabric of the trousers is handwoven Mashroo silk, while the turban cloth is made from handspun cotton.
title_text: Pant of the Bridegroom's Dress Wagho, choyni
subject_terms_1: folk costume geometric motifs embroidery (visual works) ceremonial costume bridegrooms
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Motifs Embroidery Wedding costume Pants Rabaris Bridegrooms
